dmca.title: Impossible complains of text infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madame,

our company, Impossible, s.r.o., bought rights for Czech edition of the book Trading for a Living (ISBN: 0471592242) by Mr. Alexander Elder. Information about original title you can find here:

http://www.amazon.com/Trading-Living-Psychology-Tactics-Management/dp/0471592242/

Czech edition was published last year. Information can be found here:

http://www.financnik.cz/exe/tradingem-k-bohatsvi/

But this book was reproduced and given into electronic form (PDF file). This PDF file is now shared on Internet as illegal file, which is damaging law and our rights on this title. We have already found this illegal file also on your server:

http://warforum11.googlepages.com/trade.pdf

Please, remove this file ASAP from your servers.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Best regards,

[private]
Marketing Manager

Impossible, s.r.o.
http://www.impossibleh.cz/

contact e-mail: [private]@impossible.cz
